actions.text: On agreeing to the Quayle amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to implement, administer, or enforce the Equal Employment Opportunity Enforcement Guidance Number 915.002 concerning "Consideration of arrest and conviction records in employment decisions.".
purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to implement, administer, or enforce the EEOC Enforcement Guidance Number 915.002 concerning "Consideration of arrest and conviction records in employment decisions.".
